lead_paragraph: HOWAT--Anne H. EngenderHealth mourns the passing of our friend, colleague, and Board member, Ms. Anne H. Howat. A champion for women's reproductive rights and health, Anne had served on the Board of Directors in various capacities for more than 45 years. Anne will be remembered for her passion for promoting women's rights and informed choice and increasing access to reproductive health services globally. We extend heartfelt condolences to Anne's daughters, Laura and Karen, and the entire family. We are indebted to Anne for her invaluable counsel and guidance, which made EngenderHealth an even stronger and more effective organization. We will miss her dearly. Pamela W. Barnes, President Rob Petty, Chair, Board of Directors EngenderHealth 1/3
